ActorTalk: [PlayerName], have you walked through the green area?
I heard they've been offering guided tours about rare plants there.
I don't know. Are you interested in plants?
I've always found them incredibly resilient. Seeing them so full of life makes me feel like I need to work hard, too.
You'll definitely come to like them.
I found a particularly beautiful orchid in the combat records not long ago. It's probably a Calanthe orchid from the Golden Age.
It's so beautiful... When I think about how humans once lived with such magnificent life forms, it feels like something out of a dream.
Those days will surely come again.
I'll keep an eye out for them next time I'm on the surface.
